description:
1. My Course covers how to use primavera p6 in industry standards
  2. Here i am sharing my experience so that after this course, students can understand how primavera is been used in industries
  3. PMI Standards | Following PMBOK 5th Edition
  4. My methodology of teaching is , First i will explain the topic with an industry level examples, after understanding the concept i will open the software and demonstrate how it will be done
  5. 4 levels of training
    1. beginner
    2. advance
    3. expert
    4. professional
  6. course will be handled by Er.Nikhil Raj, Btech Civil, Senior Planning Engineer
  7. Course support is unlimited
  8. There is no compromise on quality
title: Oracle Primavera P6 Training - Advance
